dmca.title: DMCA Complaint from Onkyo for fotoconnection.com
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Barbara Davis [mailto:bdavis@netenforcers.com] 
Sent: Friday, December 08, 2006 12:27 PM
To: Legal Response
Subject: RE: DMCA Complaint from Onkyo for fotoconnection.com

To Whom It May Concern: 

Thank you for removing all of Onkyo logos and copyrighted images from the urls
provided, but in order to comply fully all of the copyrighted images and/or
trademarked logos of Onkyo needs to be removed from your entire website. This case
concerning www.fotoconnection.com and Onkyo will remain open until this request is
satisfied in full.  If you should need any further assistance in reaching compliance
please let me know and I will do my best to provide you with the needed information.
 Below you will find the remaining infringing URL's.

http://fotoconnection.com/vi-22981________Onkyo-TX-SR603X-90-.html

http://fotoconnection.com/vi-23340________Onkyo-TX-SR803-S-Silver-.html

http://fotoconnection.com/vi-23426________Onkyo-TX-SR703B-7-1-.html

http://fotoconnection.com/vi-23540________Onkyo-HT-S680B-6-1-.html


Thank you for your attention to this matter,

Barbara Davis
LMS Manager
Net Enforcers Inc.
BDavis@netenforcers.com
compliance.management@netenforcers.com 

The Online Enforcement Specialists......
Statement of Confidentiality
The contents of this e-mail message and any attachments are confidential and are
intended solely for the addressee.  The information may also be legally privileged. 
This transmission is sent in trust, for the sole purpose of delivery to the intended
recipient.  If you have received this transmission in error, any use, reproduction
or dissemination of this transmission is strictly prohibited.  If you are not the
intended recipient, please immediately notify the sender by reply e-mail  and delete
this message and its attachments, if any. Thank you.


-----Original Message-----
From: legal-response@theplanet.com [mailto:legal-response@theplanet.com]
Sent: Friday, December 08, 2006 10:51 AM
To: Barbara Davis; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: DMCA Complaint from Onkyo for fotoconnection.com

To Whom It May Concern:

This letter confirms that access to the materials referenced in your below-pasted
complaint has been disabled.

Legal Response Team
The Planet



---------


 

________________________________

From: Barbara Davis [mailto:bdavis@netenforcers.com] Posted At: Thursday, November
30, 2006 2:45 PM Posted To: Inbox
Conversation: DMCA ISP Notification fotoconnection.com/Onkyo
Subject: DMCA ISP Notification fotoconnection.com/Onkyo



 

 

 

12/01/2006

 

7155 5474 4100 4346 4709

 

VIA CERTIFIED US MAIL

RETURN RECEIPT REQUESTED

 

Designated Agent

ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.

George Poletes

1333 North Stemmons Freeway Suite 110

Dallas, TX 75207

 

Re:  Unauthorized Use of Intellectual Property 

 

Dear Designated Agent:

 

This letter is to provide you notice pursuant to 17 U.S.C. ?? 512 (c) (3) (A) of
unauthorized use of copyrighted material of Onkyo USA Corporation ("Onkyo") (such
copyrighted material is referred to as "Onkyo Works" or "Onkyo IP")) by your client,
fotoconnection.com, at the URL www.fotoconnection.com.  Onkyo has a good faith
belief that use of the Infringing Material by your client is not authorized by
Onkyo, its agents, or the law.  The information contained in this letter is
accurate, and under the penalty of perjury, Net Enforcers is authorized to act on
behalf of Onkyo.

 

The specific works, graphics or other material Onkyo believes to be infringed or to
be the subject of infringing activity (the "Infringing Material") are copyrighted
images from Onkyo's website.  Specific violations of copyrighted images by
fotoconnection.com are listed below this paragraph.

 

http://www.fotoconnection.com/vi-22981________Onkyo-TX-SR603X-90-.html

http://www.fotoconnection.com/vi-23426________Onkyo-TX-SR703B-7-1-.html

http://www.fotoconnection.com/vi-23340________Onkyo-TX-SR803-S-Silver-.html

http://www.fotoconnection.com/vi-40912________Onkyo-TXSR504B-7-1-.html

 

http://www.fotoconnection.com/vi-23540________Onkyo-HT-S680B-6-1-.html

 

Therefore, pursuant to the requirements of 17 U.S.C. ?? 512(c) (1) (C), Onkyo hereby
demands that you remove or disable access to the Infringing Material in an
expeditious manner.  

 

If you have questions, please contact Net Enforcers Compliance Management Department
via facsimile to 352-505-0040, or via email to
Compliance.Management@NetEnforcers.com.  All communication must be in writing.  Net
Enforcers is authorized to handle and resolve this matter with you and has already
been involved with this case.  Calls directly to Onkyo will not be accepted.  The
Infringer has been notified of the infringement.  If you and the Infringer do not
respond to this demand as requested by 5:00 p.m. on 12/13/2006 , we will assume that
the matters described above are true and will advise Onkyo to proceed accordingly.

 

 

Sincerely,

VCLM Law



Lance C. Venable

Attorney at Law

 

LCV/roc 




 

 

 

Barbara Davis

LMS Manager

Net Enforcers Inc.

BDavis@netenforcers.com 
compliance.management@netenforcers.com 

 

The Online Enforcement Specialists......

Statement of Confidentiality
The contents of this e-mail message and any attachments are confidential and are
intended solely for the addressee.  The information may also be legally privileged. 
This transmission is sent in trust, for the sole purpose of delivery to the intended
recipient.  If you have received this transmission in error, any use, reproduction
or dissemination of this transmission is strictly prohibited.  If you are not the
intended recipient, please immediately notify the sender by reply e-mail  and delete
this message and its attachments, if any. Thank you.
